definition: to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation

sentences.english: This kind of operation can cure trichiasis effectively too.
sentences.chinese: 這種手術還可以有效地治療倒睫。

sentences.english: TT: Trachomatous Trichiasis. At least one eyelash rubs on the eyeball.
sentences.chinese: 沙眼性倒睫，至少一根睫毛摩擦眼球。

sentences.english: In the image shown, trichiasis has caused corneal scarring and loss of vision.
sentences.chinese: 在圖中，倒睫已經造成了角膜瘢痕和失明。

sentences.english: Objective To study the methods of surgical treatments in entropion and trichiasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究內翻倒睫的手術方法。

sentences.english: Trichiasis , usually due to misalignment of lashes, is a very common and otherwise troublesome problem in routine ophthalmological visits.
sentences.chinese: 倒睫，是在門診相當常見的一種眼科疾病。

sentences.english: To explore the therapeutic effect of the Trichiasis electrolyzer on congenital lacrimal fistula.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討電解倒睫器對先天性淚囊瘻管的治療作用。

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
